pages.title: Resistance Potions
pages.text: Distilled Spirits can be... $(br)umm.. distilled?$(br)$(italic)distilled further?$()$(br)into long lasting $(thing)Resistance$() Potions.

You're not even sure yourself how you came up with this recipe anymore.$(br)Maybe you inhaled a little too much $(item)Quitoxic Powder$() when you combined various ingredients. But the result is interesting, no question.

Combining everything you learned as a Spawner expert and Pigment Tinkerer gave you the ability to create plain $(item)Mob Spawners$() yourself.$(br)You only need to assign a Creature to spawn using the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l).
